product_name: REI Aldervale Roll-Up Pants - Women's Petite
long_description: The REI Aldervale Roll-Up petite pants travel and wear well, no matter what's on the day's agenda. Weather warming up? Aldervale pants roll up to capri-length and secure with snap-tab closures. Woven 2-way stretch fabric is abrasion resistant, quick drying and easy to care for; it provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Drawcord at the waist adjusts the fit; easy on/off with a zip fly and snap closure. Front angle-entry hand pockets, snap-flap cargo pocket at right leg and 2 top-entry back pockets. REI Aldervale Roll-Up pants feature a slim, lean fit; back darts shape the waist for a smooth fit.
short_description: The REI Aldervale Roll-Up petite pants travel and wear well, no matter what's on the day's agenda. Weather warming up? Aldervale pants roll up to capri-length and secure with snap-tab closures.
